contact.title: Contact
description: As a label we like to interact with our fans and future artists.
If you have any questions or suggestions, don't hesitate to contact us!

form.question: What's your question?
form.question_placeholder: For example: I'm interested to know how..

register.title: Register account
description: If you want to submit your music to Ethereal, then you'll need to create an account. It's free!
Our team will review your track as soon as possible and you'll be able to see if your track has been accepted for a release on the label.
register.privacy: If you register an account, then you give the label the permission to use your data on this platform.

form.name: Artistname
form.nickname: What's your artist name / nickname you wan to use?

forgot.title: Forgot password
description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
Don't show this link to anyone. With this link they can reset your password.

errors.forgot_error: Could not send reset link to this email.
errors.connection_graphql: Connection with database is not working.
errors.general_login: Could not login with credentials. Please try again
errors.general_register: Could not register with credentials. Please try again
errors.password_number: Password must contain at least 1 number
errors.password_capital: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
errors.password_lower: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
errors.firstname_empty: Please fill in a first name
errors.surname_empty: Please fill in a last name
